title: Annual Sports Day
description: Join us for our annual sports day celebration featuring various competitions.
content:
We are excited to announce our upcoming Annual Sports Day, a celebration of athletic excellence and school spirit. This year's event promises to be bigger and better than ever before.

Event Details

Date: March 15, 2024
Time: 8:00 AM - 4:00 PM
Venue: School Main Ground

Featured Events

  • 100m Sprint
  • Long Jump
  • Relay Race
  • Basketball Tournament
  • Football Match

Schedule

8:00 AM - Opening Ceremony
9:00 AM - Track Events Begin
12:00 PM - Lunch Break
1:00 PM - Field Events
3:30 PM - Prize Distribution

Special Arrangements

We have arranged for refreshments and seating for all parents and guardians. Medical staff will be present throughout the event to ensure safety.

title: Science Fair 2024
description: Students showcase their innovative science projects.
content:
Get ready for an exciting showcase of scientific innovation at our annual Science Fair 2024!

Event Details

Date: March 20, 2024
Time: 9:00 AM - 3:00 PM
Venue: School Auditorium

Categories

  • Physical Sciences
  • Life Sciences
  • Environmental Science
  • Technology & Engineering
  • Mathematics

Judging Criteria

Projects will be evaluated based on:
- Scientific Method
- Creativity & Innovation
- Presentation Skills
- Documentation

title: Cultural Program
description: Celebrating our rich cultural heritage through performances.
content:
Join us for a spectacular evening celebrating the diverse cultural heritage of our school community!

Event Details

Date: March 25, 2024
Time: 5:00 PM - 8:00 PM
Venue: School Auditorium

Program Highlights

  • Traditional Dance Performances
  • Musical Presentations
  • Drama Performances
  • Poetry Recitations
  • Cultural Fashion Show

Special Features

- Cultural Food Court
- Art Exhibition
- Traditional Games Corner
- Photo Booth

title: 75th Anniversary Celebration
description: Notre Dame College celebrates its 75th anniversary with great enthusiasm.
content:
Notre Dame College celebrates its 75th anniversary with great enthusiasm. Join us for this momentous occasion featuring special performances, alumni speeches, and a grand celebration of our institution's legacy.

Event Details

Date: December 15, 2024
Time: 2:00 PM - 5:00 PM
Location: Main Auditorium, Notre Dame College

Highlights

  • Special guest appearances from distinguished alumni
  • Historical exhibition of the college
  • Cultural performances by students
  • Award ceremony for notable achievements
  • Release of commemorative book

Schedule

2:00 PM - Registration and Welcome
2:30 PM - Opening Ceremony
3:00 PM - Main Event and Performances
4:30 PM - Closing Ceremony
5:00 PM - Refreshments and Networking

title: Sports Week 2024
description: Annual sports week featuring various athletic competitions and team events.
content:
Join us for our annual Sports Week featuring various athletic competitions and team events. Students will compete in multiple sports disciplines, showcasing their athletic prowess and team spirit.

Event Details

Date: December 20, 2024
Time: 8:00 AM - 6:00 PM
Location: College Sports Complex

Highlights

  • Inter-class cricket tournament
  • Basketball championship
  • Athletics meet
  • Indoor sports competitions
  • Team building activities

Schedule

8:00 AM - Opening Ceremony
9:00 AM - Track Events
11:00 AM - Team Sports
2:00 PM - Indoor Games
5:00 PM - Prize Distribution

title: Alumni Meet 2025
description: Yearly alumni gathering to celebrate achievements and strengthen connections.
content:
Join us for our yearly alumni gathering to celebrate achievements and strengthen connections. An evening of networking, sharing experiences, and reconnecting with old friends and teachers.

Event Details

Date: January 15, 2025
Time: 4:00 PM - 9:00 PM
Location: College Grand Hall

Highlights

  • Alumni success stories
  • Networking session
  • Campus tour
  • Dinner and entertainment
  • Alumni awards ceremony

Schedule

4:00 PM - Registration
4:30 PM - Welcome Address
5:00 PM - Alumni Presentations
7:00 PM - Awards Ceremony
8:00 PM - Gala Dinner
